metadata.title: CVE-2017-7788 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
When an "iframe" has a "sandbox" attribute and its content is specifiedusing "srcdoc", that content does not inherit the containing page's ContentSecurity Policy (CSP) as it should unless the sandbox attribute included"allow-same-origin". This vulnerability affects Firefox < 55.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 55.0.2+build1-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.2+build1-0ubuntu4').
